snippet: The recent injuries to Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire pose a challenge to the Knicks’ upcoming difficult stretch of three games in three nights.
abstract: Injuries to New York Knicks forward Carmelo Anthony and center Amar’e Stoudemire pose a challenge to team as it prepares for difficult stretch of three games in three nights.
lead_paragraph: The recent injuries to Carmelo Anthony and Amar’e Stoudemire pose a challenge to the Knicks’ upcoming difficult stretch of three games in three nights.

headline.seo: For the Knicks, Three Games in Three Nights Will Be a Challenge
headline.main: For Knicks, Three Games in Three Nights, and a Few Injury Questions
headline.print_headline: For Knicks, Three Games in Three Nights, and a Few Injury Questions
